# Exposures
<!-- ####################################################################### -->
```{r}
#| label: tbl-chem-info
#| tbl-cap: Information about the non-persistent EDCs.
edcs_info <- edcs_information() %>%
  dplyr::select(-c(chem_id, smiles))
gt::gt(edcs_info, groupname_col = "class") %>%
  gt::cols_label(
    full_name = "Compound", 
    short_name = "Symbol", 
    #smiles = "SMILES", 
    pubchem_cid = "PubChem CID", 
    ctd_id = "CTD ID", 
    exposome_explorer_id = "Exposome Explore ID", 
    parental_compound = "Parental compound"
  ) %>%
  gt::tab_style(
    locations = gt::cells_column_labels(columns = everything()), 
    style = list(
      gt::cell_borders(sides = "bottom", weight = gt::px(3)), 
      gt::cell_text(weight = "bold")
    )
  ) %>%
  gt::tab_style(
    locations = gt::cells_row_groups(group = everything()), 
    style = list(gt::cell_text(weight = "bold"))
  )
```
